verses.verse: It is not <S%G4851>expedient<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1211>doubtless<s%> to <S%G2744>glory.<s%> I <S%G1063>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3701>visions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G602>revelations<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

I <S%G1492>knew<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G4253>above<s%> <S%G1180>fourteen<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> ago, <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> I cannot <S%G1492>tell;<s%> <S%G3756><s%> or <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1622>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> I cannot <S%G1492>tell:<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth;)<s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1535>(whether<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4983>body,<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1622>out<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> I cannot <S%G1492>tell:<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth;)<s%>

How <S%G3754>that<s%> he was caught <S%G726>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3857>paradise,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G731>unspeakable<s%> <S%G4487>words,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for a <S%G444>man<s%> to <S%G2980>utter.<s%>

Of <S%G5228><s%> such a <S%G5108>one<s%> will I <S%G2744>glory:<s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> <S%G5228>of<s%> <S%G1683>myself<s%> I will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2744>glory,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>mine<s%> <S%G769>infirmities.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> I would <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G2744>glory,<s%> I shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> a <S%G878>fool;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I will <S%G2046>say<s%> the <S%G225>truth:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> now I <S%G5339>forbear,<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G1519>of<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> which he <S%G991>seeth<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> to be, <S%G2228>or<s%> that he <S%G191>heareth<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> I should be exalted above <S%G5229>measure<s%> through <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5236>abundance<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G602>revelations,<s%> there was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> a <S%G4647>thorn<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> the <S%G32>messenger<s%> of <S%G4566>Satan<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2852>buffet<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G3363>lest<s%> I should be exalted above <S%G5229>measure.<s%>

For <S%G5228><s%> this <S%G5127>thing<s%> I <S%G3870>besought<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G5151>thrice,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it might <S%G868>depart<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2046>said<s%> unto <S%G3427>me,<s%> My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> is <S%G714>sufficient<s%> for thee: <S%G4671><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1411>strength<s%> is made <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> weakness. <S%G769><s%> Most <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will I <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G2744>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G1981>rest<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I take <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G769>infirmities,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5196>reproaches,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G318>necessities,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4730>distresses<s%> for Christ's <S%G5228>sake:<s%> <S%G5547><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I am <S%G770>weak,<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> I <S%G1415>strong.<s%>

I am <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G878>fool<s%> in <S%G2744>glorying;<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G315>compelled<s%> <S%G3165>me:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to have been <S%G4921>commended<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G5216>you:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> in <S%G3762>nothing<s%> am I <S%G5302>behind<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> very <S%G5228>chiefest<s%> <S%G3029><s%> <S%G652>apostles,<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> I <S%G1510>be<s%> <S%G3762>nothing.<s%>

Truly <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> of an <S%G652>apostle<s%> were <S%G2716>wrought<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5281>patience,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4592>signs,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> mighty <S%G1411>deeds.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> it <S%G3739>wherein<s%> ye were <S%G2274>inferior<s%> <S%G5228>to<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G1577>churches,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> it be <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> was not <S%G2655>burdensome<s%> <S%G3756><s%> to <S%G5216>you?<s%> <S%G5483>forgive<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G93>wrong.<s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> the third <S%G5154>time<s%> I <S%G2192>am<s%> <S%G2093>ready<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I will <S%G3756>not<s%> be <S%G2655>burdensome<s%> to <S%G5216>you:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> I <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5216>yours,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G5209>you:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> to lay <S%G2343>up<s%> for <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1118>parents<s%> for <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5043>children.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> will very <S%G2236>gladly<s%> <S%G1159>spend<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G1550>spent<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>you;<s%> <S%G1499>though<s%> the more <S%G4056>abundantly<s%> I <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> the <S%G2276>less<s%> I be <S%G25>loved.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2077>be<s%> it so, <S%G1473>I<s%> did <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2599>burden<s%> <S%G5209>you:<s%> <S%G235>nevertheless,<s%> <S%G5225>being<s%> <S%G3835>crafty,<s%> I <S%G2983>caught<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> with <S%G1388>guile.<s%>
Did <S%G1223>I<s%> <S%G846><s%> make a <S%G4122>gain<s%> of <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3361>by<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of them <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you?<s%>

I <S%G3870>desired<s%> <S%G5103>Titus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> with him I <S%G4882>sent<s%> a <S%G80>brother.<s%> <S%G3387>Did<s%> <S%G5103>Titus<s%> make a <S%G4122>gain<s%> of <S%G5209>you?<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> we <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit?<s%> walked we <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2487>steps?<s%>

Again, <S%G3825><s%> <S%G1380>think<s%> ye <S%G3754>that<s%> we excuse <S%G626>ourselves<s%> unto <S%G5213>you?<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2714>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> we do all <S%G3956>things,<s%> dearly <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3619>edifying.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G5399>fear,<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> when I <S%G2064>come,<s%> I shall <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3634>such<s%> as I <S%G2309>would,<s%> and that <S%G2504>I<s%> shall be <S%G2147>found<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> such <S%G3634>as<s%> ye <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not:<s%> <S%G3381>lest<s%> there be <S%G2054>debates,<s%> <S%G2205>envyings,<s%> <S%G2372>wraths,<s%> <S%G2052>strifes,<s%> <S%G2636>backbitings,<s%> <S%G5587>whisperings,<s%> <S%G5450>swellings,<s%> tumults: <S%G181><s%>

And <S%G3361>lest,<s%> when I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that I shall <S%G3996>bewail<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> which have sinned <S%G4258>already,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> have <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3340>repented<s%> <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4202>fornication<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have <S%G4238>committed.<s%>
